name: Thierry Serrano (Kony)
quesTitle: Issue with the Kony Visualizer App Preview and IPhone.
quesDetails:
Hi,
A client has the same issue as the one reported in https://basecamp.kony.com/s/question/0D56A00000wfWQISA2/hello-i-experience-troubles-with-ios-visualizer-app-i-cant-see-the-navigation-bar-the-only-screen-that-loads-is-the-market-place-so-i-got-confused-how-to-preview-and-test-my-app-locally-can-you-please-help-me-with-this?t=1543827634021
 
 
Once the client fills her credentials, the screen displays automatically the marketplace page, and the blue Menu bar that should appear at the bottom is not present: There is no way to specify the app. 5digits.
This is for an Iphone mobile device:
IPhone model is MN8X2QL/A
iOS: 12.1 (16B92)
 
Could you please indicate if there is a fix? Right now the Kony Preview App is useless.
 
Regards
Thierry Serrano

name: Nakul Gupta (Customer)
quesTitle: Will it be possible to get a sample application containing the chatbot component?
quesDetails: I was trying to implement the chatbot component in my application but I am unable to configure it correctly. It will really help me if you could provide me a sample application(Fabric and visualizer) containing this component

name: Kony Development (Simple Plus Group Ltd.)
quesTitle: Invalid QR code image generated by the component
quesDetails:
I tried to use the QR Code generator to generate a QR code, however, the result image seems missing the border part.
I tried to update the QR code size, but the result image still incorrect, how can I fix this issue?

name: Snowlin Jose (Nuvento)
quesDetails:
Hi am having issue with kony visualizer enterprise , i created a form (installed windows sdk) and tried to drag the chatbot component to the form, but it says Component [com.konymp.chatbotkj] has been created on a higher version of Visualizer and cannot be used within this project.
please help me to resolve this problem.

name: Snowlin Jose (Nuvento)
quesTitle: Can you please provide the details to integrate wit.ai app to chatbot and provide a sample app for wit.ai?

name: Snowlin Jose (Nuvento)
quesTitle: can you please provide the documents for configuring witai with the chatbot component ?
quesDetails: i was trying to add the chat bot component in my app (android build), i just dragged the chatbot component into the app from market place , but how to configure with wit ai and what tools are needed for the backend process ? please help.

name: Aparna Amalladinne (USFoods)
quesDetails:
Hi Team,

We have a requirement to download the reports from cloud in CSV format. To achieve this, we found a market place component called CustomReports downloader.
https://marketplace.kony.com/items/kony-mobilefabric-custom-report-downloader-0

It does work for us to some extent.
When we run the below command, it pulls a csv file but its all empty
java -jar CustomReports.jar "RequestsPerServiceTable" startdate=2019-01-01,enddate=2019-01-16,appname=All dashboard
Built the above command by following the help document attached.

What we want to understand is:
1. What are the table names for each of the standard reports .
2. Filter criteria for each of those tables.
3. Why are we seeing empty files even thought there is data.

name: Brahmaiah Thota (AppIt)
quesTitle: How to move to particular form using advanced slidingmenu from marketplace ?
quesDetails: I am using advanced slidingmenu from market place. How can i move to particular form based on menu actions. I am getting menu index i want to replace a target container with another form.
